welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aspen Hill, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and vibrant community. Get ready to explore and experience all that this wonderful place has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is dedicated to serving military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves Delta Air Lines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves United Airlines and its regional partners.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport houses most of the airport's amenities and services.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for international flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is primarily used for domestic and international flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

wifi.note: WiFi is free for the first 45 minutes, after which a fee may apply.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves Southwest Airlines and includes a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves American Airlines and includes a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C primarily serves Delta Air Lines and includes a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D primarily serves United Airlines and includes a variety of dining and shopping options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private or charter planes, the private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
